alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 5:31AM CDT until May 17 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR BEAVER AND NORTHEASTERN TEXAS COUNTIES... At 530 AM CDT, automated weather equipment reported a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Boyd, or 18 miles west of Beaver, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. These storms have produced wind gusts in excess of 60 mph. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaver, Hooker, Tyrone, Forgan, Optima, Elmwood, Adams, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Baker, Mocane, Turpin and Balko. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
